title: Update failed Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: There's nothing i can do it just keeps popping up I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Most of these patcher issues have been smoothed out by now, but if you're still getting stuck please reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can help you troubleshoot!
